parameter.name: createdAfter
parameter.description: Selects opportunities that were created after the specified time.

parameter.name: createdBefore
parameter.description: Selects opportunities that were created before the specified time.

parameter.name: idGreaterThan
parameter.description: Selects opportunities with IDs greater than the specified integer.

parameter.name: idLessThan
parameter.description: Selects opportunities with IDs less than the specified integer.

parameter.name: probabilityGreaterThan
parameter.description: Selects opportunities with probabilities greater than the specified number.

parameter.name: probabilityLessThan
parameter.description: Selects opportunities with probabilities less than the specified number.

parameter.name: valueGreaterThan
parameter.description: Selects opportunities that have a value greater than a specified integer.

parameter.name: valueLessThan
parameter.description: Selects opportunities that have a value less than a specified integer.

parameter.name: prospectEmail
parameter.description: Selects opportunities associated with the specified prospect(s).

parameter.name: prospectId
parameter.description: Selects opportunities associated with the specified prospect.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Specifies the number of results to be returned.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: Specifies the first matching opportunity to be returned in the query response.

parameter.name: sortBy
parameter.description: Specifies the field that should be used to sort the results of the query.

parameter.name: sortOrder
parameter.description: Specifies the ordering to be used when sorting the results of the query.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Specifies the format to be used when returning the results of the query.
